author: draganrakita
content:
Will bump EIP-7907 with:
* revision on backward compatibility section. Additional gas for code load makes calls expensive.
* Adding exception on gas load fee, if code that needs loading is empty, hash is `keccak([])`. (Small change, but will need input from other team as this changes logic, who is best to ping on this?)

author: __kasey__
content:
re https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/674#issuecomment-3069889016 
I realize my comment here is just contextual and non-committal. I have a slight lean towards not doing this because I think this path is pretty easy to unit test on the CL side, to avoid being stuck with these rough edges long term.

author: raulvk
content:
_not_ doing, or [yes] doing? (i sense your preference is to merge the PR, but the message implies otherwise). I replied back on GH -- you bring up a good point in favour of merging re: risk mitigation.

In your msg, can you confirm that the *unit test* is for the code that would eventually handle V3? (note that you don't need to add that code now -- this change is a no-op for CLs if V2 is still returning all-or-nothing). and by "rough edges", are you referring to the laxity in behaviour as per V2 on master? if yes, I 100% -- I think this is tech debt, that's why I'm keen to merge this PR

author: __kasey__
content:
I meant that I lean to not merge - keep things as they are. The extra version means (small) complications in code and extra boilerplate. Which is a fairly minor annoyance to be fair, and tilts towards merging to add the extra version. /But/ I think the risk is so well-scoped and unit-testable that CL teams could choose to accept it to keep things simple. 

So how I would frame this from the CL side is: if all teams think they can easily be confident in the safety of leaving v2 as is, I say we keep it simple. Otherwise, merge this pr and add the rough edge to the spec and implementation so we can just punt it out of fusaka.

author: funnygiulio
content: <@340345049063882753> could you review https://github.com/nerolation/eth-7825-analysis/blob/main/EIP-7825-analysis.md and share what you think? we are considering lowering the tx gas limit to 16mn. I know you had something to say here CC <@792404665068158998>
